description: The (RCMP) is seeking services that can assist in the troubleshooting of specific issues and the development/evolution of new solutions. Issues include migrating from SharePoint 2016 to 2019, development of new SharePoint sites, and guidance on industry best practices. The RCMP's SharePoint implementation is called the Integrated Collaborative Environment (ICE) tool.
full_summary:
**Title**
TASK-BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS)

Languages: 
- English
- French

**Solicitation Information**

- Solicitation Number: 202104745
- Reference Number: PW-22-01003710
- Amendment Number: 0
- Publication Date: August 9, 2022
- Tender Closing Date: August 23, 2022 at 2:00 PM ET
- Expected Contract Start Date: NA
- Expected Contract End Date: NA

**Notice Type**
- English: Request for Proposal
- French: Demande de propositions

**Procurement Category**
- Service-oriented procurement category description not provided

**Trade Agreements**
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity/Regions of Delivery**
- National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity/End-User Entities**
- Royal Canadian Mounted Police

**Services**
- The Federal Technology Solutions group, under the Federal Policing Resource Management section, seeks IT professionals with SharePoint expertise to provide support services. 
    - Task Requirements:
        • Migrate from SharePoint 2016 to 2019
        • Develop new SharePoint sites using Designer and Nintex Forms and Workflow
        • Guidance on industry best practices
    - Requirements:
        • RCMP Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS) clearance on resources

**Point of Contact**
- Tara-Lyn Kaddouh, RCMP
- Phone: 613-302-1921
- Email: tara-lyn.kaddouh@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
- Address: 73 Leiken Dr, Ottawa, ON, CA

**Attachments**
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/e9f03b4714be388cbb0a486da4fc55e6/npp_english_202104745.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/8bd7423ac1326066a06dd330eb11e4a1/npp_french_202
